= Manual=

Function list:
0) __constructor($location) -Takes one parameter, either a city name or ZIP to retrieve the weather conditions.

1) get_wData() - Downloads and parses the XML file containing the weather data. this *must* be called first after creating a weather object.

2)get_temp($type) - Provides the current tempreature
    *Parameters*: 
        returns current tempreature in celcius if provided with an "f"

 


= Example: Get an associative array of the 4-5 day forecast =
{{{
 $weather = new weather("Dallas");

// Download the latest weather data and parse. 
$weather->get_wData();

// Show the entire 4-5 day forecast
var_dump($weather->get_forecast_assoc());
?>

}}}

== Example 2: Get current temperature ==
{{{
$weather = new weather("Los Angeles");
$weather->get_wData();
// Get temperature in Fahrenheit
$temp_fahren = $weather->get_temp('f');

// Get temperature in celsius
$temp_celsius = $weather->get_temp('c');

echo "It's currently " . $temp_celsius ."C or " . $temp_fahren ."F.";
}}}
